text: The 1994–95 Algerian Championnat National was the 33rd season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 16 teams contested the league, with US Chaouia as the defending champions, The Championnat started on November 11, 1994. and ended on June 22, 1995. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 1994-1995 * USM Alger * USM Aïn Beïda * ASM Oran Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 1995-1996 * GC Mascara * NA Hussein Dey * ASO Chlef ==League table== ==Season statistics== ===Top scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Scorer !Club !Goals |- !|1 |align="left"| Tarek Hadj Adlane |align="left"|JS Kabylie | style="text-align:center;"|23 |- !|2 |align="left"| Abdelhafid Tasfaout |align="left"|MC Oran | style="text- align:center;"|18 |- !|3 |align="left"| Nacer Zekri |align="left"|USM El Harrach | style="text-align:center;"|11 |- !|4 |align="left"| Tebbal |align="left"|MC Alger | style="text-align:center;"|11 |- !|5 |align="left"| Kamel Kaci-Saïd |align="left"|USM Blida | style="text-align:center;"|9 |- !|6 |align="left"| Hassab |align="left"|GC Mascara | style="text-align:center;"|9 |- !|7 |align="left"| Cheïkh Benzerga |align="left"|WA Tlemcen | style="text- align:center;"|9 |- !|8 |align="left"| Mohamed Djalti |align="left"|WA Tlemcen | style="text-align:center;"|8 |- !|9 |align="left"| Farid Ghazi |align="left"|US Chaouia | style="text-align:center;"|8 |} *8 goals : Mohamed Djalti (WAT), Farid Ghazi (USC). *7 goals : Idirem et Soufi (NAHD), Menad (JSK), Ardjaoui (ASO), Yessad (GCM). *6 goals : Redha Zouani (USMB), Meftah (JSK), Meziane (MCO), Benhamena (GCM), Brahimi et Sahraoui (WAT), Kaoua (CSC), Khouni, Alloui et Benhemadi (ASAM). *5 goals : Billal Zouani et Chambit (USMB), Guettal (WAB), Bensalah G. et Talis (ASO), Mehdaoui et Djillani (USC), Boulfelfel (CSC), Ali Moussa (CRB). ==References== ==External links== *1994–95 Algerian Championnat National Algerian Championnat National Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons
